text: Nawaf Bouamer (, born 4 December 1997) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Al-Nojoom on loan from Al-Ettifaq. ==Career== Bouamer began his career at youth Al-Jeel . left Al-Jeel and signed with Al-Ettifaq on July 7, 2017 . left Al-Ettifaq and signed with Al-Khaleej on loan for the 2018–19 season on August 28, 2018 . left Al-Ettifaq and signed with Al-Nojoom on July 3, 2019 . ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Al Jeel Club players Category:Ettifaq FC players Category:Khaleej FC players Category:Al- Nojoom FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players Category:Association football forwards
title: Nawaf Bouamer
